btv.download.tracker

Class Tracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • btv.download.tracker.Tracker
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HTTPTracker, UDPTracker

    public abstract class Tracker
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class encapsulates the notion of a BitTorrent Tracker. This class will be used by subclasses to set up the query String which will be used to contact Trackers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Tracker() 
      protected Tracker(java.lang.String tracker1, java.lang.String hash, java.lang.String peerID, java.lang.String port, java.lang.String downloaded, java.lang.String uploaded, java.lang.String left)
      This constructor takes a tracker address and various query values and stores the tracker address and the query string.

      This method will be used to contact a Tracker and will return their response as a bdecoded Map

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tracker

        protected Tracker()

      • Tracker

        protected Tracker(java.lang.String tracker1,
       java.lang.String hash,
       java.lang.String peerID,
       java.lang.String port,
       java.lang.String downloaded,
       java.lang.String uploaded,
       java.lang.String left)
        This constructor takes a tracker address and various query values and stores the tracker address and the query string.
        Parameters:
        tracker1 - The tracker address.
        hash - The SHA1 hash of the info dictionary of the Torrent.
        peerID - The peer ID of the BitTorrent client.
        port - The port the BitTorrent client will use to listen for incoming peer connections
        downloaded - The number of bytes of this Torrent that have been downloaded already.
        uploaded - The number of bytes of this Torrent that we have uploaded already.
        left - The number of bytes of this Torrent that we have yet to download.

    • Method Detail

      • getTracker

        public java.lang.String getTracker()
        Returns:
        The address of this Tracker.

      • getQueries

        public java.lang.String getQueries()
        Returns:
        The query string that will be sent to this Tracker.

      • contact

        public abstract java.util.Map contact()
                               throws BDecodingException
        This method will be used to contact a Tracker and will return their response as a bdecoded Map
        Returns:
        The bdecoded Tracker response
        Throws:
        BDecodingException - If the BDecoder cannot parse the trackers response.
